Text:
Not a big Vai-fan, but I've been looking for the 3 titles from "Crossroad (1986)" so I'm def greatful for this. Maybee I'll find something else as well!
Thanks!

Vai is amazing. He records and produces everything himself. One of the best guitar players to ever live. Amazing to watch him play. If you still think Jimi Hendrix is the best guitar player who ever lived... broaden your horizons and listen to Vai.... seriously.
Honestly, I'd say it's Hendrix > Satriani > Vai> everyone else.
Forgot to say, THANKS FOR THE UPLOAD!  Took a while to get, but great stuff.
Which one is better songwriter? ;-) Too many forget's Hendrix composition skill's, pure EVERGREEN!!!

It's Vai, hands down.
Satch is a sound, though distant, second.
Anyone confirm the quality on these tracks? VBR or 320 or what?
somebody just help me i'm stuck in 88.8% for three days still not finish downloading wat the hell is going on there
Detected multiple viruses with BitDefender 2010, but seeing as no one else seems to be finding any I'm guessing it's a fluke. Anyone else scanned?
Looking for the Flex-able 1988 extend re-release CD with the 4 bonus tracks on Akashic Records OR the same remastered version in 1997 on Epic Records... please help :)
